body.p: Probability is a measure of how likely an event is to occur. Choose the probability that best matches each of the following statements:
(b) This event will occur more often than not, but is not extremely likely:
(c) This event is extremely unlikely, but it will occur once in a while in a long sequence of trials:
(d) This event will occur for sure:
